meanings.definition: Existing or carried on between schools
meanings.sent1: The interscholastic basketball game was exciting for all the students.
meanings.sent2: She participated in interscholastic debates representing her school.
meanings.sent3: The interscholastic spelling bee turned into a fierce competition.
meanings.sent4: His interscholastic rivalry with the neighboring school was legendary.
meanings.sent5: The interscholastic track meet brought together athletes from different schools.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving competition between schools
meanings.sent1: The interscholastic soccer tournament showcased the talent of young players.
meanings.sent2: Students eagerly awaited the interscholastic quiz bowl competition.
meanings.sent3: The interscholastic math challenge was a real brain-teaser.
meanings.sent4: Her interscholastic chess matches were always intense and strategic.
meanings.sent5: The interscholastic science fair encouraged creativity and innovation among students.
